name: Saving Sprinkles
description:
Your pet Sprinkles is very suck, and there are no veterinarians in your town. The only person that can help save your pet is the grumpy wizard down the street. For the healing potion you will need precious memories of your pet that later will be melted in a cauldron to make the healing potion. Hurry! Save Sprinkles!

Credits
